input.sentences: she was overjoyed all her friends showed up .
there was a lot of food at the party .
everyone helped themselves to all the food .
they went onto the living room and told some stories .
she was laughing at some of the gifts they gave her .
output.sentences: Two girls posed for a picture to celebrate an engagement party.
Lovely food was served as guests took turns to get photos.
They all gathered to open gifts.
They sat in a circle to drink drinks and watch.
The bride to be got some awesome gifts.
